c74object.name: fl.maxpos~
c74object.digest: Calculates the index of the maximum value of the input frame
c74object.description: The output is a single value. When the input frame is empty then the output is determined by the empty parameter.

entry.name: /empty [enum]
entry.description:
INSTANTIATION ONLYSets the output to use when an empty input frame is received:
[0] - empty - output an empty frame.[1] - default - output the default value (see the default parameter).
(default: empty)

entry.name: /default [double]
entry.description:
INSTANTIATION ONLYSets the default output value.
(default: 0)

objarg.name: [stream-specifier]
objarg.description: Optionally, the first argument may be used to explicitly specify the number of streams. This is done using a symbol starting with the character = followed by the required number of streams (without a space). For example, an argument of =4 will set the number of streams to 4.

objarg.name: empty
objarg.digest: Sets the output to use when an empty input frame is received
objarg.description:
This argument sets the empty parameter:
Sets the output to use when an empty input frame is received:
[0] - empty - output an empty frame.[1] - default - output the default value (see the default parameter).
(default: empty)

objarg.name: default
objarg.description:
This argument sets the default parameter:
Sets the default output value.
(default: 0)

method.name: info
method.description:
Print info about fl.maxpos~ to the max window for reference purposes. If no arguments are provided then all information is posted to the Max window. Else a set of flags is used to select which sections of the reference to display, and whether or not the information should be provided in a shortened form.
The following flags are available:
description - display the object description.inputs - display info on inputs.outputs - display info on outputs.io - display info on both inputs and outputs.parameters - display info on the object parameters.quick - display shorten versions of any info displayed.

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib's connection routines. User messages have no effect.

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib's connection routines. User messages have no effect.

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description:
Sets the realtime state for fl.maxpos~. When set to 0 fl.maxpos~ forms part of a non-realtime network for performing offline processing in Max message threads. This mode of operation uses buffer~ objects for audio IO.
More info on non-realtime processing with FrameLib can be found in Tutorial 11.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description:
Sets the context name for fl.maxpos~ in order to determine distinct processing contexts.
More info on FrameLib contexts can be found in Tutorial 10.
